sections.title: Activation
sections.text: Activate your product key at: https://predator.systems/products/ (registration required)

sections.title: Troubleshooting Steps
sections.text:
If you are experiencing troubles launching our software, please follow these steps:

- Disable your antivirus and delete it if necessary
- Disable Microsoft Defender
- Disable all driver anti-cheats:
  - For Faceit: Open cmd as admin and run: "sc stop faceit"
  - For Valorant: Open cmd as admin and run: "sc stop vgc" then "sc stop vgk"
- Ensure you are NOT using the "-vulcan" launch option (unsupported)
- Make sure the time in Windows settings is synchronized

sections.title: Known Problems & Solutions
sections.text:
1) Problem: "An error occured in the secure channel support" / "The request has timed out" / "The operation timed out"
   - Solution: Traffic is being blocked (by an anti-cheat, antivirus, firewall, or ISP). Fully uninstall your antivirus and any other anti-cheats, resync your time and region in Windows settings, and try enabling/disabling your VPN.

2) Problem: "Internal public server error"
   - Solution: Traffic is being blocked (by an anti-cheat, antivirus, firewall, or ISP). Fully uninstall your antivirus and any other anti-cheats.

3) Problem: "Antivirus Interference detected"
   - Solution: Traffic is being blocked (by an anti-cheat, antivirus, or malware). Fully uninstall your antivirus and any other anti-cheats, and scan your PC using a tool (e.g., https://free.drweb.ru/cureit/).

4) Problem: Reason: [<code>] sym: <some info>
   - Solution: Create a ticket in our support section (https://predator.systems/support) and attach a screenshot of the information (Press WIN + R, type "winver").

5) Problem: Reason: modules::load_module: failed to create section
   - Solution: Fully uninstall your antivirus and any other anti-cheats.
